title: Singapore Oceanarium
blurb: Plan your visit to the Singapore Oceanarium today!
description: Explore the wonders of marine life at the Singapore Oceanarium. Discover diverse ecosystems and fascinating sea creatures. Enhance your visit with immersive programmes and expert-led tours. Enjoy augmented and virtual reality experiences. Shop and dine at our various outlets. Check our daily schedule for events and activities. Plan your visit with our visitor guide, parking directions, and operating hours. Explore the oceanarium map and accessibility options. Go beyond the surface with an insider experience and more. Retreat into a realm where marine magic meets luxury at Ocean Dreams.
datetime_display: Operating Hours Calendar Oceanarium Map Accessibility Insider Experience Go beyond the surface in an expert-led tour of iconic zones, behind-the-scenes insights and more
Keyword_tag: marine life, oceanarium, sea creatures, immersive programmes, tours

title: S.E.A Aquarium: Animals and Habitats Exploration
blurb: Explore multi-sensory zones and featured marine animals.
description: Come face-to-face with thousands of sea jellies in one of the world's largest Kreisel habitats. Wander within a whale fall skeleton and witness how it becomes an oasis in the harshest depths. Explore multi-sensory zones including 'In the Beginning', 'At the Surface', 'Sunlight Into the Deep', 'The Abyss', and 'A New Horizon'. Discover featured animals such as the American Paddlefish, Bowmouth Guitarfish, Indo-Pacific Leopard Shark, and Sand Tiger Shark. Learn about animal care and ocean wonders in this immersive experience, suitable for families and children interested in marine life and conservation.
datetime_display: Sunlight Into the Deep The Abyss A New Horizon Featured Animals American Paddlefish Bowmouth Guitarfish Indo-Pacific Leopard Shark Sand Tiger Shark View All Animals Animal Care Ocean Wonders Come face-to-face with thousands of sea jellies in one of the world's largest Kreisel habitats
Keyword_tag: S.E.A Aquarium, marine life, sea jellies, whale fall, ocean animals, family activities, kids attractions

title: Ocean Discovery Experience
blurb: Learn about the ocean's history and habitats.
description: Dive into the story of the ocean, from its history to the habitats and species that spark wonder. Explore Singapore's rich marine ecosystems and learn about the efforts to sustain aquatic life. This educational experience is perfect for families and children of all ages who are interested in learning more about the ocean and its inhabitants. Discover the wonders of the underwater world through interactive exhibits and engaging displays. Suitable for all ages, this experience offers a unique opportunity to connect with marine life and understand the importance of conservation efforts. The Ocean Discovery Experience provides an immersive and educational journey for the whole family.
Keyword_tag: Ocean, marine life, education, aquarium, Singapore, family, kids, aquatic life, conservation

title: Singapore Oceanarium Conservation & Science
blurb: Marine research, conservation, and animal welfare.
description: At Singapore Oceanarium, we focus on marine research and conservation as well as the welfare and sustainability of our animal populations. We are committed to conservation outreach and engagement projects. We also offer opportunities to volunteer with us to support marine life through research, outreach, and conservation. Our focus is on ensuring the sustainability of our animal populations through dedicated research and conservation efforts. We strive to engage the community through various outreach programs and provide avenues for individuals to contribute to marine life preservation.
Keyword_tag: Marine research, conservation, animal welfare, volunteer, outreach, marine life

title: S.E.A Aquarium - Ocean Discovery Experience
blurb: Learn about the ocean's history and its habitats.
description: Discover the story of the ocean, from its history to the habitats and species that spark wonder. Dive into Singapore’s rich marine ecosystems and learn about the efforts to sustain aquatic life. Explore the wonders of marine biodiversity and Singapore's coastal heritage through engaging educational programmes suitable for preschool, primary, secondary school levels, and above. Educator programmes and a Children's Biodiversity Library are also available to enhance the learning experience.
Keyword_tag: Ocean discovery, marine life, Singapore coastal heritage, educational programmes, biodiversity library

title: Ocean Dreams
blurb: Experience a magical overnight adventure at S.E.A Aquarium.
description: Embark on an unforgettable overnight adventure at S.E.A Aquarium! Ocean Dreams is an immersive programme that offers a unique opportunity to sleep alongside marine animals. Enjoy educational activities, a guided tour, and a restful night surrounded by the wonders of the ocean. This family-friendly experience is perfect for creating lasting memories and fostering a deeper appreciation for marine life. Suitable for children and adults alike, Ocean Dreams provides a comfortable and engaging environment to learn about and connect with the underwater world. Discover the secrets of the deep sea and wake up to the mesmerizing sight of marine creatures swimming gracefully before your eyes. An experience that combines education, adventure, and relaxation for the whole family.
Keyword_tag: overnight stay, marine animals, educational activities, guided tour, family-friendly, underwater world
full_address: 8C8R+58, Jungutbatu, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia

title: Ocean Dreams: Marine Magic Meets Luxury Glamping
blurb: Enjoy after-hours access, private tour, luxury glamping!
description: Retreat into a realm where marine magic meets luxury at Ocean Dreams. Enjoy after-hours access, a private tour, and spend the night in a luxury glamping tent before Singapore Oceanarium’s most stunning habitat, complete with curated meals, cosy amenities, and ocean views. Experience highlights include glamping with a view, full-board dining, exclusive guided tours, up-close and curated animal encounters, and curated take-home mementos. Additional entitlements include 2-day Singapore Oceanarium admission, drinks and snacks basket, hot beverage station, kids activity corner, powerpoints, hot showers, and Wi‑Fi.
Keyword_tag: glamping, marine life, ocean adventure, family staycation, guided tour
full_address: lot 1333, Jalan Jeti Anjung Batu, 77300 Merlimau, Melaka, Malaysia

title: Singapore Oceanarium Signature Tent Experience
blurb: Enjoy a unique overnight glamping experience.
description: Experience a luxurious overnight stay in a signature tent at the Singapore Oceanarium. This exclusive package accommodates up to 4 guests per tent and is designed for guests aged 6 years and above. Participants under 21 must be accompanied by a paying adult (21+), with a maximum ratio of 3 children to 1 adult per tent. The experience lasts for 2 days and 1 night, offering a memorable and immersive adventure. Enjoy VIP lounge access and create lasting memories with your family in this unique setting. The program is conducted in English.
Keyword_tag: Glamping, overnight stay, marine experience, family activity

title: Singapore Oceanarium: Glamping with a View
blurb: Enjoy a 2D1N stay at the Open Ocean habitat.
description: Experience a unique glamping adventure with a 2D1N stay at the Open Ocean habitat, featuring premium glamping tents with two double bed air mattresses. Enjoy full-board dining with dinner, late-night snacks, and breakfast. Participate in exclusive guided tours of front-of-house and behind-the-scenes areas (capacity up to 12 guests per group; closed-toe footwear required). Get up close with manta ray feeding and Dolphin Exploration programmes (subject to weather conditions). Receive curated take-home mementos, including an amenities pouch, personalised credentials lanyard, enamel pin, animal badges, and a 6R printed photograph. Additional entitlements include 2-day Singapore Oceanarium admission, drinks and snacks basket, hot beverage station, kids activity corner, powerpoints, hot showers, and Wi-Fi.
Keyword_tag: Glamping, Ocean habitat, Animal encounters, Guided tours, Family activity

title: Glamping with a View
blurb: Full-Board Dining Dinner, late-night snacks provided
description: Experience a unique glamping adventure with full-board dining including dinner, late-night snacks, and breakfast. Enjoy breathtaking views and comfortable accommodations. Perfect for families seeking a memorable and relaxing getaway. This immersive program offers a blend of luxury and nature, creating an unforgettable experience for all ages. Indulge in delicious meals and create lasting memories with your loved ones in this stunning setting. The glamping site is equipped with all the necessary amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Wake up to stunning views and start your day with a hearty breakfast before exploring the surrounding area.
Keyword_tag: Glamping, family getaway, full-board dining, ocean view, luxury camping

title: S.E.A Aquarium Immersive Programme: Ocean Dreams
blurb: Full-Board Dining and Exclusive Guided Tours available.
description: Enjoy Full-Board Dining and Exclusive Guided Tours. Front-of-house and behind-the-scenes support area tours (Capacity: up to 12 guests per group). Closed-toe footwear required; involves walking of stairs. Explore the wonders of marine life with exclusive access and dining experiences. Perfect for families and marine enthusiasts seeking a unique and immersive adventure. Discover the secrets of the ocean and create unforgettable memories with our expertly guided tours and delicious dining options. This programme offers a comprehensive and engaging experience for all ages, combining education and entertainment in a captivating setting.

title: S.E.A Aquarium - Exclusive Guided Tours
blurb: Up-Close and Curated Animal Encounters at S.E.A Aquarium
description: Experience exclusive guided tours at S.E.A Aquarium, offering up-close and curated animal encounters. Participate in Manta Ray feeding and Dolphin Exploration programmes, subject to weather conditions. Discover the wonders of marine life with these unique and engaging experiences suitable for families and marine enthusiasts. These tours provide an educational and entertaining experience for all ages, fostering a deeper appreciation for the ocean's biodiversity. title: Up-Close and Curated Animal Encounters
blurb: Curated Take‑Home Mementos Amenities pouch included.
description: Enjoy up-close and personal encounters with fascinating marine animals at the Singapore Oceanarium. This immersive program offers curated take-home mementos, including an amenities pouch with an eye mask and socks, a personalized credentials lanyard, an enamel pin, animal badges, and a 6R printed photograph. Perfect for families and children who love marine life, this experience provides unique opportunities to learn about and interact with a variety of ocean creatures in a memorable and engaging way. Discover the wonders of the underwater world through these special encounters.
Keyword_tag: Animal Encounters, Marine Life, Oceanarium, Family Activities, Kids Activities

title: Singapore Oceanarium Immersive Ocean Dreams Programme
blurb: Enjoy a unique overnight stay at the Singapore Oceanarium.
description: Experience an unforgettable overnight adventure at the Singapore Oceanarium with the Ocean Dreams immersive programme. Enjoy a 2-day admission, drinks and snacks, a kids' activity corner, hot showers, and Wi-Fi access at the Open Ocean habitat. This unique experience offers families a chance to connect with marine life in a comfortable and engaging setting. Perfect for families seeking a memorable and educational adventure, the programme includes curated take-home mementos and additional entitlements to enhance your stay. The programme is designed to provide a comfortable and engaging experience for all ages, with amenities and activities catering to both children and adults. Enjoy the wonders of the ocean in a whole new light with this immersive overnight experience.
Keyword_tag: Oceanarium, overnight stay, marine life, family activity, immersive programme

title: Singapore Oceanarium Signature Glamping Tents
blurb: Enjoy a unique overnight stay in glamping tents.
description: Experience a memorable overnight stay in Signature Glamping Tents at the Singapore Oceanarium. Each tent accommodates up to 4 participants, with a minimum age of 6 years. Enjoy buffet-style dining (no pork, lard, or peanuts). Wheelchair accessible public areas are available. Participants must wear covered footwear and secure loose items. Lockers are provided for belongings. Participants aged below 21 must be accompanied by a paying adult (max 3 children to 1 adult). Note that some support areas may not be wheelchair friendly. Crutches and strollers are not permitted in support areas. Programme cancellation may occur if the minimum number of participants (6 signature tents) is not met 7 days prior to the event.
datetime_display: wed to bring in their belongings, such as handphones and wallets, or wear jewellery and other accessories upon entering Marine Mammal Habitat
Keyword_tag: Glamping, overnight stay, marine life, family activity

An ideal getaway for those looking to explore marine biodiversity in a novel way.

title: Singapore Oceanarium - Ocean Dreams Immersive
blurb: Buffet-style dining provided, no pork, lard, peanuts.
description: Enjoy buffet-style dining at the Singapore Oceanarium. Please note that all food is prepared without pork, lard, or peanuts. For any further enquiries, please write in to experiences@singaporeoceanarium.com. This immersive program offers a unique dining experience suitable for families and individuals looking for a special culinary adventure. The buffet features a variety of dishes catering to different tastes, ensuring a delightful meal in a captivating ocean-themed setting. The absence of pork, lard, and peanuts makes it suitable for guests with specific dietary requirements or preferences. The dining area provides a comfortable and engaging atmosphere, enhancing the overall experience.
Keyword_tag: Oceanarium, dining, buffet, family-friendly, immersive experience

title: Marine Mammal Habitat at S.E.A Aquarium
blurb: Explore the Marine Mammal Habitat at S.E.A Aquarium.
description: The Marine Mammal Habitat at S.E.A Aquarium requires participants to wear covered footwear and secure loose items. Belongings like phones, wallets, jewelry, and accessories are not allowed inside the habitat. Small lockers are provided for storage. This ensures the safety and well-being of both the participants and the marine mammals. The habitat offers an immersive experience, allowing visitors to observe and learn about these fascinating creatures in a controlled environment. It's a family-friendly activity that promotes education and conservation awareness. The habitat is designed to provide a safe and enriching environment for the marine mammals, while also offering visitors a unique and memorable experience. The facility adheres to strict guidelines to ensure the well-being of the animals and the safety of the visitors.

title: S.E.A Aquarium Ocean Dreams Immersive Programme
blurb: Glamping experience with marine life observation.
description: The Ocean Dreams immersive programme at S.E.A Aquarium offers a unique glamping experience where participants can sleep in a tent and observe marine life. It is designed for participants aged 6 years old and above. Participants aged below 21 must always be accompanied by a paying adult aged 21 years old and above, subjected to a maximum ratio of 3 children to 1 adult per Glamping Tent. This programme provides an opportunity to learn about marine animals and their habitats in an engaging and memorable way. It combines the adventure of camping with the educational aspect of marine conservation, making it a family-friendly activity.
Keyword_tag: Marine life, glamping, ocean adventure, family activity

title: Singapore Oceanarium: An Accessible Aquatic World
blurb: Explore an accessible aquatic world for all visitors.
description: Singapore Oceanarium welcomes participants on wheelchairs, ensuring all public areas are accessible. While some support areas may not be fully wheelchair-friendly due to stairs, the main attractions are accessible to everyone. For safety, crutches and strollers are not permitted in support areas. The oceanarium offers a wide range of marine life exhibits and immersive experiences suitable for families and visitors of all ages. Discover the wonders of the underwater world in a comfortable and inclusive environment. Explore diverse marine ecosystems and encounter fascinating sea creatures. The oceanarium is committed to providing an enjoyable and educational experience for all guests, regardless of mobility.
datetime_display: friendly due to the presence of stairs
Keyword_tag: Oceanarium, marine life, aquatic world, wheelchair accessible, family-friendly, sea creatures
